com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage

Interface StaticBuffer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<StaticBuffer>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReadBuffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReadArrayBuffer, ReadByteBuffer, StaticArrayBuffer, StaticByteBuffer

    public interface StaticBuffer
extends Comparable<StaticBuffer>
    A Buffer that only allows static access. This Buffer is immutable if any returned byte array or ByteBuffer is not mutated.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)
